articles.description: Seven goals, two penalties and a "game-changing" red card - VAR dominates again as Manchester United lose in Copenhagen.
articles.title: VAR 'out of control' in Man Utd's Copenhagen defeat

articles.description: Leandro Trossard and Bukayo Saka score as Arsenal claim a comfortable victory over lacklustre Sevilla in their Champions League Group B tie at Emirates Stadium.
articles.title: Trossard and Saka lead Arsenal to easy Sevilla win

articles.description: Ben Stokes showed again why he is England's ultimate team player with a superb century in victory over the Netherlands.
articles.title: Ultimate team man Stokes refuses to 'leave early'

articles.description: Lionesses manager Sarina Wiegman believes it is "a matter of time" before a female manager takes charge of a professional men's team in England.
articles.title: Female boss in men's game 'a matter of time' - Wiegman

articles.description: Claressa Shields grew up without support, protection or a bed to call her own. She has since scaled the heights to bring joy to Flint, a city that has become a byword for a broken American dream.
articles.title: 'Don't mess with Claressa' - a fighter as hard as Flint

articles.description: Formula 1's governing body postpones the hearing into the Haas team's attempt to change the results of the United States Grand Prix.
articles.title: Haas' right of review for US Grand Prix postponed

articles.description: Watch as England's Joe Root is bowled through his legs by Netherland's Logan van Beek for 28 in their Cricket World Cup match in Pune.
articles.title: 'He's been nutmegged!' - Root bowled through his legs by Van Beek

articles.description: Premier League clubs are to vote on a temporary ban stopping teams from loaning players from clubs under the same ownership in January.
articles.title: Newcastle's move for Neves could be banned in vote

articles.description: Australia captain Meg Lanning has announced her international retirement after 13 years at the highest level of cricket.
articles.title: Lanning retires to end 13-year Australia career

articles.description: Hibernian's winless run stretches to seven games as St Mirren level in the 91st minute to share the points in the Scottish Premiership.
articles.title: St Mirren level late as Hibs' winless run continues
